about_the_game:
CHASERS is an Urban Fantasy Collectible RPG set against the conflict between the sky city of Aluna, which monopolizes the power of the sun, and the resistance forces of the surface, Line.

Mediator, assemble your own team and join the battle!

· Diverse Characters and Growth System
Collect unique characters, develop their abilities, and strengthen your team. Each character has a distinct story and skillset, allowing for strategic combinations in battle.

· Strategic Combat System
Swap characters in real-time, utilizing skills and attributes to defeat enemies. Experience the thrill of precise dodging and timing to turn the tide of battle.

· Immersive Worldbuilding
Explore the captivating story of Aluna and the resistance forces, uncovering secrets across diverse cities and mysterious locations. The journey to uncover the truth behind the sun's power awaits.

· Variety of Game Content
Enjoy main story missions, challenge modes, PvP battles, and mini-games! With monthly updates adding new events and characters, there’s always something to look forward to.

  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3225, AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660, ATI Radeon HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 , AMD Radeon RX 580

short_description: The sky city ALUNA monopolizes the sun, and the resistance CHASERS fights back! A hack-and-slash RPG with deep world-building and strategic battles. No gacha! Play your favorite characters and build your ultimate team. Master elemental affinities, real-time swaps, dodges, and skill combos to win!
